description: decay_rate (float) – The layer-wise decay ratio.name_dict (dict) – The keys of name_dict is dynamic name of model while the valueof name_dict is static name.Use model.named_parameters() to get name_dict.n_layers (int) – Total number of layers in the transformer encoder.
